item.title: Cropping a Multiple Page PDF Using Command Line (macOS)
item.author: danton_dot_noriega-at-gmail_dot_com (Danton Noriega)
item.description: pdfcrop command I learned about pdfcrop in a stackoverflow post. pdfcrop is a tool that can crop multiple-page PDFs (not to be confused with multiple PDFs). Discovering it was memorable enough that I thought it warranted a post. Installation The full version of MacTex comes with a command line tool called pdfcrop. See if you have it by typing: $ which pdfcrop /Library/TeX/texbin/pdfcrop If you donâ€™t have, it can be installed from TexLive:
